title: Alec Baldwin and pregnant wife Hilaria in full-length black dress support NY Philharmonic Fall Gala
text:
They are regular fixtures on the New York social scene.

And on Monday Alec and Hilaria Baldwin joined in another high society event - the New York Philharmonic Fall Gala 2019.

The couple turned out in style with the actor, 61, in black tie and his wife, 35, in a sleeveless full-length black dress.

Date night: They are regular fixtures on the New York social scene. And on Monday Alec and Hilaria Baldwin joined in another high society event - the New York Philharmonic Fall Gala 2019

Hilaria accessorized with a diamond necklace and stud earrings.

She wore her hair in a messy updo, rimmed her eyes with black liner and mascara and added matte pink lip color.

She stepped out in gold sandal heels and carried a large silver and black evening bag.

Dressed to the nines: The couple turned out in style with the actor, 61, in black tie and his wife, 35, in a sleeveless full-length black dress

Stylish: Hilaria accessorized with a diamond necklace and stud earrings. She stepped out in gold sandal heels and carried a large silver and black evening bag

Expanding their family: The pair, who married in 2012, recently announced that they are expecting their fifth child together

The pair, who married in 2012, recently announced that they are expecting their fifth child together.

They are already parents to daughter Carmen, six, and sons Rafael, four, Leonardo, three, and Romeo, 16 months.

Hilaria loves to share her pregnancy journeys with her social media followers.

She revealed her latest one last month, saying she was 'excited' to be expecting again five months after suffering a miscarriage.

'These first few months are tough with exhaustion and nausea ... and I don't want to have to pretend that I feel OK,' she said on Instagram.

Pregnant: Hilaria loves to share her pregnancy journeys with her social media followers and revealed last month she was 'excited' to be expecting again five months after a miscarriage
description: Hilaria, who recently announced she's expecting the couple's fifth child, accessorized with a diamond necklace and stud earrings.
